summary: *Halloween* is a scary movie from 2007, remade from an older film. Rob Zombie made it, and it's about a killer named Michael Myers. As a kid, he killed his family and was sent to a mental hospital. But he escapes and starts chasing a girl named Laurie and her friends on Halloween. The movie shows how Michael became a killer. It didn't get great reviews, but it made a lot of money. There's even a sequel!
title: Halloween (2007 film)
